description: This season Fjallraven's passion for trekking and winter adventures becomes evident as they proudly launch a series of state of the art jackets and parkas that are direct descendants of the legendary Expedition Down Jacket from 1974. The strong Fjällräven DNA together with their leading standards of sustainability and 60 years of trekking experience make the Expedition Down Series an obvious choice to a wide range of outdoor enthusiasts looking for Fjällräven’s unmatched reliability and functionality.
name: Expedition Long Down Parka - Mens
